name: campquest
description: CampQuest is a campsite search application where users can specify a number of criteria for what they are looking for in a campsite. It's goal is to make it easier to find and compare campgrounds that match the user's specified criteria across a number of providers. It will return a list of campgrounds that match the users preferences and display information about them. Additionally, it will provide a provision for users to submit information about campgrounds to maintain the accuracy of it's campground data as well as to review campgrounds to help other users inform their selections.
